overview: Pete McCormick joined Maveron as a partner in 2000 and leads the administration of Maveronâ€™s partnerships, including all limited partner matters, and assists with the evaluation and structuring of portfolio investments and exits. As an advisor to Maveron, and a resource for our portfolio companies, he invariably offers a valuable and creative perspective on a wide variety of issues. Prior to Maveron, Pete was a partner and a member of the managing board of directors of the Seattle law firm Graham & Dunn. During his 19-year legal career, he helped a wide variety of businesses resolve disputes in the areas of contracts, acquisitions, securities, intellectual property, licensing, trade secrets, and employment matters. He is a recipient of the Professionalism Award from the Washington State Bar Association, Young Lawyers’ division. Pete currently serves on the GameLogic, Knowledge Networks and TerraPass boards. He holds a BA in economics, Phi Beta Kappa, from the University of Washington, and a JD degree with honors.
